Iverson_Allen Iverson_32pts_9assists_Denver_Nuggets_vs_Blazers_06/07_NBA_*Steve Blake_Steve Blake_Career_Night Playing in just his second game with the Denver Nuggets, Steve Blake showed the Portland Trail Blazers what they've been missing. Steve Blake , traded to Milwaukee in the offseason and acquired by Denver from the Bucks last week, had a career-high 25 points against his former team Sunday night, in Denver's 109-93 victory over Portland. "I'm not surprised because a good basketball player is a good basketball player and that's what he is, said Steve Blake 's new teammate, Allen Iverson . Allen Iverson had 32 points and nine assists for the Nuggets, who trailed at halftime but outscored the Blazers 41-17 in the third quarter. The victory snapped a two-game losing streak

comScore, Google's sites reached nearly 179 million unique users in November, ranking second only behind Yahoo's.
